Sentencas: Ships are moving land in the vast ocean and are an indispensable means of transportation for humanity.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: At present, green power systems and low-carbon fuels are the development trend of energy-saving, emission-reduction, and low-carbon consumption of green ships.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: However, existing ships have many waste heat emissions and considerable noise pollution from shipboard electromechanical equipment.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: Based on the above issues, this study combined SOFC (Solid Oxide Fuel Cells) with a GT (Gas Turbine) and ORC (Organic Rankine Cycle).
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: It proposed a waste heat-driven composite energy recovery system for the green power ships.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: Based on the feasibility analysis of single SOFC performance and waste heat utilization, combined with GT-ORC system, the thermodynamic model construction, working medium selection, energy, exergy and economy (3E) analysis of the whole system are carried out.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: The result shows that among the effective energy destruction of the entire system, the endogenous effective energy loss accounts for 89.73%.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: The avoidable-endogenous energy destruction of GT accounted for 92.95%, which has a significant improvement in saving space.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: The investment cost of heat exchanger accounts for the highest proportion, which is 22.62%.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: Therefore, it is necessary to focus on strengthening the heat exchange process to reduce the investment cost.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships

Sentencas: The evaporative pressure and isentropic efficiency seriously affect the investment ratio of the system, in which the investment of expander and working medium pump increases by 34.6% and 153.3%, respectively, within the allowable working conditions.
Titulo: Energy, exergy and economy (3E) investigation of a SOFC-GT-ORC waste heat recovery system for green power ships
